metadata.title: CVE-2022-0436 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - high
metadata.description:
Path Traversal in GitHub repository gruntjs/grunt prior to 1.5.2.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-0436` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

grunt - 1.5.3-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: grunt package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.3-2').
